snippet: Some companies have used wineries as a place to hold corporate meetings, where workers can enjoy activities like picking grapes or making wine.
abstract: Wineries around the world are increasingly accommodating businesses asking for meeting space, catering and even wine-making lessons for their employees; sampler is presented of vineyards offering corporate retreats.

byline.original: By CHRISTINE NEGRONI and STACY SLINKARD

lead_paragraph: Some companies have used wineries as a place to hold corporate meetings, where workers can enjoy activities like picking grapes or making wine.

headline.main: A Corporate Retreat for Team-Building, With a Taste of Wine
headline.print_headline: A Corporate Retreat For Team-Building, With a Taste of Wine
